SEARCH

Package be.belegkarnil.game.board.spectrangle

package be.belegkarnil.game.board.spectrangle
Contains all of the classes for creating, instancing a Spectrangle game and for playing.
Since:
2025-04-22
Version:
0.9
Author:
Belegkarnil
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    be.belegkarnil.game.board.spectrangle.event
    Provides interfaces and classes for dealing with different types of events fired by the Spectrangle game components.
    be.belegkarnil.game.board.spectrangle.gui
    Contains all of the classes for creating user interfaces of the Spectrangle game and for painting the triangle pieces.
    be.belegkarnil.game.board.spectrangle.strategy
    Contains the Strategy interface to implements IA and some concrete example that are able to interact within the Spectrangle game.
  • Class
    Description
    Action
    This class represents all possible actions during a Game.
    Bag
    The class represents the bag of Piece linked to a Board during a Game.
    BelegSpectrangle
    This class is the main class that run the game with GUI.
    Board
    This class represents the board of the Spectrangle game.
    Constants
    This class contains global colors information of the original Spectrangle game
    Game
    The class implements the behavior of the Spectrangle game (a modified two players version with skip and penalities)
    Piece
    This class defines all existing Spectrangle pieces, there are triangle shape with three colors and one value.
    Player
    This class represents a Spectrangle player that use a Strategy and owns some Pieces.
